title: Origami: A House Full of Gratitude Activity
blurb: Craft a merry origami house wind chime with us!
description: Slow down and craft a merry origami house wind chime, while reflecting on what we’re thankful for. A nourishing art experience for kids aged 4–12, guided by @lyttlespace. title: Sensory Play: Farmyard Adventure at ecmmune LBC
blurb: Hands-on farmyard world of textures and animal friends.
description: Let your child step into a hands-on farmyard world of textures, music and adorable animal friends, suitable for ages 1-6 years old. From muddy pig pens to golden cornfields, your child can explore different sensory experiences related to farm life. Activities include playing with textured materials, creating farm-themed art, and interacting with toy animals. This immersive experience is designed to stimulate creativity and sensory development in young children. Parents are encouraged to participate and guide their children through the various activities. The farmyard adventure provides a fun and educational environment for children to learn about nature and animals.
datetime_display: friends, suitable for ages 1-6 years old with @littlejoyplay

title: LBC Activities: Origami & Sensory Play Adventures
blurb: Origami house wind chime & farmyard sensory play.
description: Engage in creative activities at LBC! Join the Origami: A House Full of Gratitude session to craft a merry origami house wind chime, reflecting on thankfulness. This nourishing art experience is designed for kids aged 4–12, guided by @lyttlespace. Alternatively, step into a hands-on farmyard world of textures, music, and adorable animal friends with Sensory Play: Farmyard Adventure, suitable for ages 1-6 years old with @littlejoyplay. Both activities offer unique and enriching experiences for young children to explore their creativity and senses in a fun and supportive environment.
